name: part_000
file: tmp_【#ときのそらお披露目誕生日2022】HappyMeowthday!!な3D配信！！ [hrpubiRwB-k]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Opening sequence for Tokino Sora's 3D Birthday Live 2022, titled 'HappyMeowthday!!'. The scene shows a montage of characters and event graphics with upbeat instrumental music.
Tokino Sora appears on stage, greeting the audience and welcoming them to her birthday live performance.
Tokino Sora performs the song 'Kimagure Mercy' on stage with a dynamic choreography and background visual effects.

subtitles.original: 皆さん、こんにちは！ときのそらです。
subtitles.english: Hello everyone! I'm Tokino Sora.

subtitles.original: 本日は『HappyMeowthday!!』3Dライブ、
subtitles.english: Today is the 'HappyMeowthday!!' 3D live,

subtitles.original: 見に来てくれてありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: thank you so much for coming to see it!

subtitles.original: 気まぐれメルシィ feat. 初音ミク
subtitles.english: Kimagure Mercy feat. Hatsune Miku

subtitles.original: ほらほらまた始まった
subtitles.english: Look, look, it's starting again

subtitles.original: お得意の自己弁護言い訳
subtitles.english: Your specialty: self-defense and excuses

subtitles.original: でもね　だって
subtitles.english: But you know, "because..."

subtitles.original: ほらほらまた始まった
subtitles.english: Look, look, it's starting again

subtitles.original: ごめんからのキスのパターンって感じ
subtitles.english: The "kiss after apologizing" pattern

subtitles.original: あーにー
subtitles.english: Ah, hey...

subtitles.original: いつか私だけ　そんな夢見たこともあったけど
subtitles.english: I once dreamed of being the only one for you

subtitles.original: 寂しい時だけ電話して　もううんざりだわ
subtitles.english: Calling only when you're lonely, I'm sick of it

subtitles.original: 全然私に興味ないじゃん
subtitles.english: You have no interest in me at all

subtitles.original: 君が好きなのは自分自身でしょ
subtitles.english: The one you love is yourself, isn't it?

subtitles.original: Yeah やっぱり私に興味ないじゃん
subtitles.english: Yeah, I knew it, you're not interested in me

subtitles.original: その話も聞き飽きたわ
subtitles.english: I'm tired of hearing that story

subtitles.original: そもそもだいたい私に興味ないじゃん
subtitles.english: In the first place, you don't care about me

subtitles.original: そうやってまたごまかしても
subtitles.english: Even if you try to deceive me like that again

subtitles.original: Be my boy　わがまま過ぎるベイベー
subtitles.english: Be my boy, you're too selfish, baby

subtitles.original: 抱きしめてよね
subtitles.english: Hold me tight, okay?

subtitles.original: ほんときみはしょうもないな
subtitles.english: You really are hopeless

subtitles.original: まあ私もしょうがないな
subtitles.english: Well, I guess I'm helpless too

subtitles.original: 泣いたって行かないでって言ったって
subtitles.english: Even if I cry or tell you not to go,

subtitles.original: 食わぬのよ
subtitles.english: it won't work

subtitles.original: もう少しだけならまあ踊ってもいいかもな
subtitles.english: Maybe it's okay to dance just a little longer

subtitles.original: 蕩けて解けていきたいの
subtitles.english: I want to melt and dissolve away

subtitles.original: どんなアピールも意味ないし
subtitles.english: No matter how I appeal to you, it's meaningless

subtitles.original: 気づいてくれないけど
subtitles.english: You don't even notice

subtitles.original: 私が寂しい時だって
subtitles.english: Even when I'm feeling lonely,

subtitles.original: 会いに来て
subtitles.english: come and see me

subtitles.original: 全然私に興味ないじゃん
subtitles.english: You have no interest in me at all

subtitles.original: どこがダメなのか教えてよ
subtitles.english: Tell me what's wrong with me

subtitles.original: Yeah やっぱり私に興味ないじゃん
subtitles.english: Yeah, I knew it, you're not interested in me

subtitles.original: 携帯ばかりいじってさ
subtitles.english: You're always playing with your phone

subtitles.original: そもそもだいたい私に興味ないじゃん
subtitles.english: In the first place, you don't care about me

subtitles.original: 少しぐらい期待させてよ
subtitles.english: Let me have a little bit of hope

subtitles.original: Lonely girl　独り占めてよベイベー
subtitles.english: Lonely girl, keep me all to yourself, baby

subtitles.original: 振り向かせないで
subtitles.english: Don't make me look away

subtitles.original: Hey baby melty one-two-step with me
subtitles.english: Hey baby melty one-two-step with me

subtitles.original: 踊りましょう
subtitles.english: Let's dance

subtitles.original: 速くて　蕩けて　繋いで
subtitles.english: Fast, melting, and connecting

subtitles.original: 最後に一つだけ
subtitles.english: One last thing

subtitles.original: 溺れるくらい愛してよ
subtitles.english: Love me so much I feel like I'm drowning

subtitles.original: 全然私に興味ないじゃん
subtitles.english: You have no interest in me at all

subtitles.original: 君が好きなのは自分自身でしょ
subtitles.english: The one you love is yourself, isn't it?

subtitles.original: Yeah やっぱり私に興味ないじゃん
subtitles.english: Yeah, I knew it, you're not interested in me

subtitles.original: その話も聞き飽きたわ
subtitles.english: I'm tired of hearing that story

subtitles.original: そもそもだいたい私に興味ないじゃん
subtitles.english: In the first place, you don't care about me

subtitles.original: そうやってまたごまかしても
subtitles.english: Even if you try to deceive me like that again

subtitles.original: Get it up!　覚悟はできてるの
subtitles.english: Get it up! I'm prepared for this

subtitles.original: きまぐれメルシィ
subtitles.english: Kimagure Mercy
